title: Combined runic and Hebrew
content:
This is a continuation on the post at [http://www.typophile.com/node/94050](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417073657/http:/www.typophile.com/node/94050), where I showed one way in which I approached the design task.  
See here the samples of variations (images DKseraphyrGIF and DKzyrfarkGIF), including a version with greater conveyance of the runic style that I mentioned.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417073657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DKseraphyrGIF_4463.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417073657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DKzyrfarkGIF_5937.gif)
author: dudefellow
